turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right, I'd like to order from Starbucks, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, where is the store located?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: McGuire Air Force Base.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you say mcguire airforce base?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I did.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok and what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a cappuccino.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: a grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. what type of milk do you prefer?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could I have nonfat milk, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, any whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, it's clean.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. is there anything else you would like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so a grande capuccino with nonfat milk, is this correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great. your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the starbucks store at the mcguire airforce base.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome. you will receive a text message with your receipt.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: bye, enjoy!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
